title: Burn With Me
description: Prescott Tate is a private man whose life is one of excitement and adventure. The best part is he's the Chief of Colorado's Hot Shots Crew. The worst part is the newest addition to his team, firefighter Dallas Freestone, is a gorgeous distraction he doesn't need.Dallas is young and driven to succeed in his lifelong ambition of being on the front lines, fighting fires and saving lives. The last thing he needs is to be preoccupied by his seemingly distant Chief, who is sending mixed signals. But his attraction to the hot and rugged Prescott has kindled a slow burn he can't extinguish.Both men are conflicted, but Dallas' partner in the field, Jill Andrews, can clearly see what's happening with the new hot shot and her beloved Chief. She not so subtly urges Prescott forward to finally allow love into his life, but he resists in fear of the publicity it wound bring to the department.Can Prescott and Dallas ignore their insatiable thirst for one another or will they succumb to the desire and chance losing everything they've worked so hard for?
author: Riley Simpson
